channel.title: I think, therefore I am
channel.description: Recent content on I think, therefore I am

item.title: Python Machine Learning Prediction with Flask
item.description: Introduction As a python and machine learning enthusiast , i love reading blogs and code. In this article we will use Python and Flask in Deploying Machine Learning algorithms. The main focus of the article will be how Flask/Python is used in deploying ML algorithms , we will not deep dive in to the Algorithms and their performance . The take away from the article will be how dataset is fed to flask app and how are we sending the prediction back via jinja templete and what modules are encountered during the process.

item.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
item.description: Brief Intro to Machine Learning Machine learning Machine learning (ML) is the study of computer algorithms that can improve automatically through experience and by the use of data. Reference: Wiki Tools and Languages for Machine learning Python Easy to learn Languages Many Good Machine Learning libraries are available in python Libraries in Python Numpy NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing in Python.Numpy Pandas Pandas is an open source, BSD-licensed library providing high-performance, easy-to-use data structures and data analysis tools for the Python programming language.

item.title: Python SQL-Data Transfer to Text File
item.description: Now is better than never The “WHY” for writing this article is “Can an idea be molded into code when provided with proper tools and inspiration . This drove me to write simple python code and this article as well As title suggest our main goal is to extract and transfer data from database to text file using python as a tool .There are lot of tools and methods that help us in achieving the above goal.

item.title: About
item.description: Guy who loves to code and enjoys every bit of life. Philosophy in life is ‘I Think Therefore I Am’ title of my blog coined by René Descartes (1596–1650) a French philosopher and mathematician. Hope you enjoy my blogs. Thanks .

item.title: A P J Kalam -- an Inspiration...
item.description: Where there is righteousness in the heart, there is beauty in the character. When there is beauty in the character, there is harmony in the home. When there is harmony in the home, there is order in the nation. When there is order in the nation, there is peace in the world.
